  <title>LAKES</title>
  <abstract>Features in this dataset represent areal bodies of water, such as lakes, reservoirs, and wide rivers. Features are represented by polygon geographic shapes. To form a full set of hydrography for the state of Colorado, please combine this polygonal data with the linear geographic dataset named STREAMS.

Used for general reference and cartography

Features in this dataset represent areal bodies of water, such as lakes, reservoirs, and wide rivers. Features are represented by polygon geographic shapes. To form a full set of hydrography for the state of Colorado, please combine this polygonal data with the linear geographic dataset named STREAMS.

Used for general reference and cartography</abstract>
